note.p: Research Field: Mathematics, cosmography, geography, navigation
Education: University of Coimbra, MA, BD, LLB

Career: Professor of Mathematics, University of Coimbra (1662); Judge of Fora de Santarém (1663); Judge, Provedor de Portalegre, Judge, Lamego (1672); Civil Judge 'corregidor', district of Lisboa (1681); Chief Cosmographer of the Kingdom of Portugal

Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Oldenburg, V, p. 569-71; Amaral, A. E. Maia do, 2018, 'Adenda mas não Corrigenda ao catálogo “Sócios portugueses da RSL” in Boletim da Biblioteca Geral da Universidade de Coimbra, Vol 48
